name: A.R.S (Alien Rescue Simulator)
description:
In this game, you are an alien soldier who is in charge of rescuing the intergalactic Tardigrade, the most important creature in the universe.

The tardigrade is taken as hostage by humans in a secret base, and it is dying. However, you can pick organs from dead humans to feed it and restore its health.

Controls:

  • WASD: Movement
  • Space Bar: Hold to grab the stretcher.
  • Mouse movement: Aim
  • Left Click: Shoot
